roleset.name: to abandon a position or association
roleset.note: DEFECT-V NOTES: Frames file for 'defect' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from defect.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: with Arg2
example.text: The latter comes from the perception [*ICH*-1] , on the part of many people in network TV , that their only hope of [*]keeping viewers-2 from [*-2] defecting to cable is [*] to fill the airwaves with an increasingly raw sensationalism .

example.name: intransitive
example.text: In last week 's House vote , 41 Republicans defected .
